name: The Lost Flower Game
description:
This Game is in the Development phase and made by VYSNVNT, The Lost FLower is a puzzle platformer current has only 4 levels and some basic features but from now on till Saturday 19 Feb I am working on it full time, writing daily devlogs and sharing my progress on my social media so stay connected for so many further updates😊.

Instructions📜 -  [A], [D] - to move left or right respectively 

[W] - Jump

[Space], [Enter or Return] - to click on any focused button in the menu or dialogs

[Arrow UP], [Arrow Down]  or [W], [S]  - To select an option in the Menu

[Esc] - to pause the game at any level

Notices📌 -

- Options Menu Contains "Play On Mobile" option which is set to "NO" by default if you set it to "YES" this feature gives you on-screen buttons to move and jump for mobile controls, but due to WebGL error this game may not work on all mobile browsers (Especially not working on google chrome app).

- Do not use the "Quit" Button in the WebGL version of the game it may cause some issues.

Licence©️ - All the content of this game is made and copyrighted by VYSNVNT. Note -> This Game is in development, so don't forget to check out our devlogs about new updates and our journey throughout the development.
